group_1.narration: My family, the Maos, is made up of my@dad, 4 girls, and 3 boys. Eight in all.

group_1.textLeft: I'm home!

group_1.textRight: Hello.

group_1.textLeft: Hi, Sis!

group_1.textRight: Yay, Kokoro is here! Come in, come in!

group_1.narration: Our house is tiny, and we're always@stretched thin money wise.@You could never describe us as well-off.

group_1.textRight: Welcome home!

group_1.textLeft: I'm starvin'... I want some of Kokoro's@cheesecake again.

group_1.textRight: Hey! Don't demand things from our guest!
You liked it? I'll make sure to bring one @over next time I visit.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, you don't have to...

group_1.narration: But when the eight of us are together,@I hardly think about being poor.

group_1.textLeft: Hm?

group_1.narration: Wait a minute.@Am I missing something?

group_1.textLeft: Uh?

group_1.textRight: [chara:302001:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Ayame?!

group_1.textLeft: That's me!

group_1.textRight: Oh, I don't think we've met. I'm Kokoro@Awane, your big sister's friend.
Nice to meet you, er, Ayame?

group_1.textLeft: Yup, yup, yup!
Anyway, Himika! Listenâ€”
Wait, did you just say "big sister"?

group_1.textRight: Oh, Kokoro, she's not my sister, she's@actually a friend of mine.
This is Ayame Mikuri. We're actually the@same age.
[chara:301601:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Oh! I-I'm so sorry! You blended right in,@and I just completely...

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302801:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Hee hee! If anythin', I'm the big sister@here!

group_1.textRight: Nooo, you're definitely the baby!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302801:effect_emotion_angry_1][se:7218_anger]Hey!
By the way, Ayame's also a Magical Girl.
She lives with two other Magical Girls,@Konoha and Hazuki.
The three of them aren't related by blood,@but they're like a family.

group_1.textRight: Wow!
Friends who care for each other like family?@That sounds great.
So Ayame, what brings you by?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah! So listen! You know all about wild@plants you can eat, right?
And about mountains too, right?

group_1.textRight: Mountains? Someone who knows all there is@to know about mountains is right here.
Uh, I like hiking, but I wouldn't say that@I know all there is to know...

group_1.textLeft: Oooh!
So um...
Konoha and Hazuki kinda collapsed...

group_1.textRight: What?!
C-collapsed?!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302801:lipSynch_1]Yeah...
I really want 'em to get better.
So I wanna find the flower from this picture@book!

group_1.textRight: Picture book? [chara:301601:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301601:cheek_0][chara:301601:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:301601:lipSynch_1]Oh, this one.
Is that the one with the "rare blue flower@that can cure any illness"?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, yeah!
They always read this to me back when@we lived at the Azalea House!
I really love this book!

group_1.textRight: I like it too!
I also... [chara:302001:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302001:cheek_0][chara:302001:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:302001:lipSynch_1]Wait, hold up!
Shouldn't you take them to the hospital@first?

group_1.textLeft: They already went to the doctor. They said@it was food poisonin'.

group_1.textRight: Oh, food poisoning?

group_1.textLeft: I guess they ate some of Konoha's cookin'...
She got even more carried away than usual.

group_1.textRight: (Cooking that sent them to the doctor...@What in the world did she make?)
(Sounds like Konoha's bad at cooking. That's@surprising.)
Wait, but you were okay, Ayame?

group_1.textLeft: I wasn't home, so I didn't eat any of it.

group_1.textRight: Ah, I see.

group_1.textLeft: So that's why I wanna find the "rare@blue flower that can cure any illness."
I wanna bring it to 'em so they can get@better!

group_1.textRight: I understand how you feel, but...

group_1.textLeft: And, and, and! I heard all about it!
Your dad's healthy again 'cause of that@flower, right Himika?
